data.name: Every
data.value: 只要

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽可能多的人们

data.name: DONATE WITH CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD NOW
data.value: 立即用信用卡捐款

data.name: An amount of your choice to help as many people as you can.
data.value: 我自己选择的余额尽可能多地帮助他们。

data.name: gift of:
data.value: 捐款：

data.name: I would like to make a
data.value: 我想

data.name: DONATE NOW USING WECHAT OR ALIPAY
data.value: 立即用微信或支付宝捐款

data.name: Or scan the QR code below with your Alipay app to donate now:
data.value: 或者用支付宝扫描下面的二维码：

data.name: Donate
data.value: 捐款

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open with Browser' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在浏览器打开”。

data.name: Please open this page in your browser.
data.value: 请在您的浏览器中打开此页面

data.name: To make a donation with Alipay, please select 'Open in Safari' from the context menu (three dots) at the top of your screen.
data.value: 为了使用支付宝进行捐款，请点击右上角菜单按钮（三个点）选择“在Safari打开”。

data.name: monthly
data.value: 每月

data.name: one time
data.value: 一次

data.name: quarterly
data.value: 每季

data.name: yearly
data.value: 每年

data.name: Amount is required.
data.value: 金额是必需的。

data.name: Please enter a valid amount.
data.value: 请输入一个有效的金额。

data.name: My urgent gift for cold weather support
data.value: 我为严寒天气提供的紧急捐款

data.name: When the weather is cold, more people come to us and they all need urgent help.
data.value: 寒冷的季节里，更多的人来到这里，寻求紧急的救助。

data.name: At 88 RMB per person, it only takes 264 RMB to provide a meal, winter clothes and urgent support for three.
data.value: 仅需88元就能帮助1人，264元就能为3人提供一顿饱餐、冬装和紧急的救助。

data.name: At $13.50 per person, it only takes $40.50 to provide a meal, winter clothes and urgent support for three.
data.value: 仅需$13.50就能帮助1人，$40.50就能为3人提供一顿饱餐、冬装和紧急的救助。

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and winter clothes for 1 person
data.value: 为1人提供一顿温暖的饭菜、淋浴及冬装

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and winter clothes for 3 people
data.value: 为3人提供一顿温暖的饭菜、淋浴及冬装

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and winter clothes for 6 people
data.value: 为6人提供一顿温暖的饭菜、淋浴及冬装

data.name: I want my gift to repeat automatically every month.
data.value: 我愿意每个月自动捐出同样的数额。

data.name: I would like to make a gift of:
data.value: 我想捐款：

data.name: Every hot meal we serve at the Renewal Center relies on a supporter gift of 15 RMB. And your gift of 60 RMB could provide a meal, plus one day of accommodation on our incredibly effective job training program.
data.value: 我们在日新中心提供的每顿热腾腾的餐食都需要15元人民币的捐赠。若您捐赠60元，就可以为人们提供一顿热饭，外加参与一天卓有成效的就业培训项目及寄宿费用。

data.name: to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: An amount of my choice to help as many people as I can.
data.value: 尽我所能帮助尽量多的人。

data.name: My gift to beat the summer slump
data.value: 我愿做出捐赠来抵抗夏季的低迷

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 50 people
data.value: 为50人提供热腾腾的饭菜、淋浴和干净的衣服

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 30 people
data.value: 为30人提供热腾腾的饭菜、淋浴和干净的衣服

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 90 people
data.value: 为90人提供热腾腾的饭菜、淋浴和干净的衣服

data.name: Give people in desperate need a home away from home – and training to live independently.
data.value: 给急需帮助的人送去家的温暖——同时让他们参与培训从而最终能够独立生活。

data.name: The Renewal Center is facing a summer slump in giving, and people’s futures are at risk. Your gift will help keep us going to offer meals, showers, shelter and training to give homeless people a second chance.
data.value: 日新中心正面临夏季捐赠收入下滑的低迷，这里的人们的未来正岌岌可危。您的捐赠可以使我们有能力继续为无家可归的人们提供食物、淋浴、住所和培训，以及开始新生活的机会。

data.name: to provide a hot meal, shower, and clean clothes for 10 people
data.value: 为10人提供热腾腾的饭菜、淋浴和干净的衣服
